channel.title: Scoreboard problems (WRX' come help please)

item.title: Scoreboard problems (WRX' come help please)
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

i’m having trouble with my score board when I or
some one else clicks on it they get logged out.

[code]//In-game highscores
public int playerRank = 0;

public void resetRanks() {
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
server.ranks = 0;
server.rankPpl = “”;
}
}

public void highscores() {
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@", 8144); //Title
sendQuest("@dre@official Fusion-Scape Highscores! TOP 20!", 8145);
for(int i = 0; i < 20; i++) { // you also need to change this for it to display more, simply the number you want it to display, say 20 = for(int i = 0; i < 20; i++)
if(server.ranks > 0) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rank “+(i+1)+”: @red@"+server.rankPpl+ "@bla@ - Total Lvl:@whi@ " +server.ranks, 8147+i);
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
resetRanks();
}
//end highscores[/code]

please help me soon

Read full topic
